Posts.Content: Aug 16, 2011 06:45PM afioresi wrote: Hi Linda,  I restarted the Tamoxifen on August 1st.  It's now the 15th and the raging anxiety is back and oddly enough, sheer exhaustion as well.  I'm also taking Lexapro (10 mg.) in the hopes of warding off depression.  I don't know how I am going to handle five years of this when I can't even make it past the 1st month.
Posts.Title: Staring at my bottle of Tamoxifen Linda_M afioresi
